Biographical note
George R. Swartz Sr. was born in 1877. He was a pastor of the Reformed Episcopal Grace Church at 1110 Herkimer Street in the Bedford Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn from 1903-1913 and of St. Paul's Lutheran Church in the Coney Island neighborhood of Brooklyn from 1929-1957. He passed away in 1967.

Content Description
The records consist of seventeen booklets that document marriages conducted by Pastor George R. Swartz Sr. (1877-1967) in Brooklyn, dating from 1903-1938. He was pastor of the Reformed Episcopal Grace Church (Bedford Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn) from 1903-1913 and of St. Paul's Lutheran Church (Coney Island neighborhood of Brooklyn) from 1929-1957. The booklets contains stubs that record the names, residences, ages, race, birthplace, father's name, and mother's name of the brides and grooms. It also records whether the bride or groom was previously married and the bride's maiden name (if divorced or widowed).
